name: Landcaster's Courteous Apartment
address: 20 Nui Truc, Ba Dinh, Ba Dinh District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Situated 700 metres from Giang Vo Exhibition Center in Hanoi, this air-conditioned apartment features a terrace. Landcaster's Courteous Apartment boasts views of the city and is 1.2 km from Hanoi Temple of Literature. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property.

The unit fitted with a kitchenette with a microwave and fridge. A flat-screen TV with cable channels is offered.

One Pillar Pagoda is 1.2 km from Landcaster's Courteous Apartment, while Vietnam Fine Arts Museum is 1.4 km from the property. Noi Bai International Airport is 21 km away.
